title: New Nidalee Splashes Not Showing Up?
body: Hello! I have every Nidalee skin, and the patch 6/11 comes with the splash updates for nidalee. When I run my client, no updates are needed and the french maid nidalee splash is shown underneath the launch and whatever. I even looked at the patch notes and it included the new splashes. How come they aren't showing up for me in game. Is this happening to anyone else? And if so, do you know when they will be showing up?

replies.body: m8 the patch didnt even came out yet...
When I made this the patch was showing up in my client, so I thought it did. Although is really was 6.10, it was showing 6.11. :/
Should be good with the new patch! ^-^

> [{quoted}](name=AbubintShea,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=W3VxTBVi,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-06-01T23:39:55.408+0000)
>
> Hello! I have every Nidalee skin, and the patch 6/11 comes with the splash updates for nidalee. When I run my client, no updates are needed and the french maid nidalee splash is shown underneath the launch and whatever. I even looked at the patch notes and it included the new splashes. How come they aren&#039;t showing up for me in game. Is this happening to anyone else? And if so, do you know when they will be showing up?

Because this week had Memorial Day to start, everything is a day later than normal. Patch 6.11 comes out early tomorrow morning. :)
If u look carefully at ur client now should be still 6.10, im sure the 6.11 update is tomorrow and by that time the splash art will be updated :D
